com.ephesoft.gxt.core.client.util

Class DialogUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ephesoft.gxt.core.client.util.DialogUtil

  • public class DialogUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility to get MessageDialog or ConfirmationDialog according to requirements with different details for the dialog box.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ephesoft
    See Also:
    MessageDialog, ConfirmationDialog

    • Method Detail

      • showMessageDialog

        public static MessageDialog showMessageDialog(java.lang.String title,
                              java.lang.String message)
        Initializes the Non-Modal Message Dialog Box with the title title and the message
        Parameters:
        title - String Heading to be set. Accepts HTML String for the heading.
        message - String Message to be displayed in the MessageBox. Accepts HTML String as a Message.
        Returns:
        MessageDialog a message dialog box.

      • showMessageDialog

        public static MessageDialog showMessageDialog(java.lang.String title,
                              java.lang.String message,
                              DialogIcon icon)
        Initializes the Non-Modal Message Dialog Box with the title title and the message
        Parameters:
        title - String Heading to be set. Accepts HTML String for the heading.
        message - String Message to be displayed in the MessageBox. Accepts HTML String as a Message.
        icon - DialogIcon Parameter which decides which type of icon should be displayed. If null INFO icon will be displayed.
        Returns:
        MessageDialog a message dialog box.

      • showConfirmationDialog

        public static ConfirmationDialog showConfirmationDialog(java.lang.String title,
                                        java.lang.String message)
        Creates a Non-Modal confirmation dialog with the given title and the message. By default no cancel button will be displayed and default icon will be shown for confirmation dialog.
        Parameters:
        title - String title to be set to the Dialog
        message - String message to be set to the confirmation Dialog.
        Returns:
        ConfirmationDialog a confirmation dialog box.

      • showConfirmationDialog

        public static ConfirmationDialog showConfirmationDialog(java.lang.String title,
                                        java.lang.String message,
                                        boolean showDiscardButton)
        Creates a Non-Modal confirmation dialog with the given title and the message. By default question mark icon will be displayed.
        Parameters:
        title - String title to be set to the Dialog
        message - String message to be set to the confirmation Dialog.
        showDiscardButton - if true then shows the discard button, else donot show the button
        Returns:
        ConfirmationDialog a confirmation dialog box.

      • showConfirmationDialog

        public static ConfirmationDialog showConfirmationDialog(java.lang.String title,
                                        java.lang.String message,
                                        boolean showDiscardButton,
                                        DialogIcon icon)
        Creates a Non-Modal confirmation dialog with the given title and the message.
        Parameters:
        title - String title to be set to the Dialog
        message - String message to be set to the confirmation Dialog.
        showDiscardButton - if true then shows the discard button, else donot show the button
        icon - DialogIcon Parameter which decides which type of icon should be displayed. If null QUESTION icon will be displayed.
        Returns:
        ConfirmationDialog a confirmation dialog box.

      • showConfirmationDialog

        public static ConfirmationDialog showConfirmationDialog(java.lang.String title,
                                        java.lang.String message,
                                        DialogIcon icon)
